title: OrderLine Data Model Schema
description: This Schema defines the OrderLine data in ODS

OrderLineData.description: This object identifies the fields required to describe OrderLine object in ODS

OrderNumber.description: The OrderNumber in the source system

OrderLineID.description: The OrderLine's ID in the source system

LineNumber.description: The LineNumber in the source system

ProductNumber.description: The ProductNumber in the source system

ProductName.description: The ProductName in the source system

Uom.description: The Uom in the source system

OrderedQty.description: The Ordered Quantity in the source system

ShippedQty.description: The Shipped Quantity in the source system

LineStatus.description: The Line Status in the source system

Price.description: The Price in the source system

ShipMethod.description: The Shipping Method in the source system

TrackingNumber.description: The Tracking Number in the source system

ProofStatus.description: The Proof Status in the source system

HoldStatus.description: The Hold Status in the source system

ShipDate.description: The Shipping Date in the source system

ImprintColor.description: The Imprint Color in the source system

ImprintLocation.description: The Imprint Location in the source system
